T02D2361:7b-0: @7b * // mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo byed bla ma ste //
T02D2361:7b-1: 'thung pa'i be'u ni rang gi sems nyid yin //
T02D2361:7b-2: mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jo ka na pa //
T02D2361:7b-3: rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2361:7b-4: ba 'jo snod gsol ga re m'a ma k'i //
T02D2361:7b-5: ba 'jo snod ni dri med lhan cig skyes //
T02D2361:7b-6: mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jo ka na pa //
T02D2361:7b-7: rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2361:7b-8: mkha' la bzhos shing bzhos shing snod bkang bzhag / bzung bar mi nus 'di ltar glang po lnga //
T02D2361:7b-9: mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jo ka na pa //
T02D2361:7b-10: rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2361:7b-11: mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo byed 'dir ma mthong //
T02D2361:7b-12: ji ltar nang du chus gang ka li pa //
T02D2361:7b-13: mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jo ka na pa //
T02D2361:7b-14: rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
